item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer vows tough reforms and seeks to calm markets
2. Trump says Liz Cheney is ‘war hawk’ who should face ‘guns trained on her’
3. Israeli secret services make arrests after leak probe in Netanyahu’s office
4. US says ‘Russian influence actors’ are behind viral election video hoax
5. US Space Force warns of ‘mind-boggling’ build-up of Chinese capabilities
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
